statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 5 , 8 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x^{2} - 9 \, x + 15 , 5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 2 , 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 5 , -6 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
